name: Condition.encounter
title: Condition.encounter
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.definition: The Encounter during which this Condition was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.
element.comment: This will typically be the encounter the event occurred within, but some activities may be initiated prior to or after the official completion of an encounter but still be tied to the context of the encounter. This record indicates the encounter this particular record is associated with.  In the case of a "new" diagnosis reflecting ongoing/revised information about the condition, this might be distinct from the first encounter in which the underlying condition was first "known".
